moddoc-header-class: Header for modules that export a class
moddoc-header-function: Header for modules that export a function
moddoc-header-items: Header for modules that export a static table
moddoc-header-other: Subheading for public items that aren't package members (e.g. return tables)
moddoc-header-private: Subheading for private items that are local to a module
moddoc-no-content: Lua error when queried module is non-existent
moddoc-no-markup: Lua error when queried module contains no documentation markup
moddoc-parentheses: Used to wrap item types and tag entry types. {{optional}}
moddoc-separator-colon: Used to separate tag entry labels from the entry documentation. {{optional}}
moddoc-separator-semicolon: Used to separate item or tag types. {{optional}}
moddoc-tag-error: Tag entry label for a function's @error tags. $1 is the number of @error tags present for the item
moddoc-tag-field: Tag entry label for a table's @field tags. $1 is the number of @field tags present for the item
moddoc-tag-fixme: Tag entry label for an item's documented bugs. $1 is the number of @fixme tags present for the item
moddoc-tag-note: Tag entry label for an item's developer notes. $1 is the number of @note tags present for the item
moddoc-tag-return: Tag entry label for a function's @return tags
moddoc-tag-see: Tag entry label for an item's @see tags
moddoc-tag-todo: Tag entry label for an item's @todo tags
moddoc-tag-usage: Tag entry label for an item's @usage tags
moddoc-tag-warning: Tag entry label for an item's warning notes. $1 is the number of @warning tags present for the item
moddoc-type-boolean: Lua's boolean type for items or tags
moddoc-type-function: Lua's function type for items or tags
moddoc-type-member: Custom type for class members that are primitives (boolean, number or string)
moddoc-type-nil: Lua's nil type for items or tags
moddoc-type-number: Lua's number type for items or tags
moddoc-type-string: Lua's string type for items or tags
moddoc-type-table: Lua's table type for items or tags
moddoc-type-variable: Custom type for private items that are primitives (boolean, number or string) and local to a module
